name: EUFO_2020
description: Binary values, where 1 is forest.
source: Bourgoin, C., Ameztoy, I., Verhegghen, A., Carboni, S., Colditz, R.R., Achard, F. (2023). Global map of forest cover 2020 (Version 1). European Commission, Joint Research Centre (JRC) [Dataset] PID: http://data.europa.eu/89h/10d1b337-b7d1-4938-a048-686c8185b290.

name: GLAD_Primary
description: Binary input layer representing primary forest in 2001. Loss pixels 2001-2020 removed with ancillary dataset.
source: Turubanova, S., Potapov, P. V., Tyukavina, A., & Hansen, M. C. (2018). Ongoing primary forest loss in Brazil, Democratic Republic of the Congo, and Indonesia. Environmental Research Letters, 13(7), 074028. https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/aacd1c

name: TMF_undist
description: Tropical moist forest (TMF) classes (i.e., 10, 11 & 12) in 2020 representing undisturbed cover.
source: Vancutsem, C., Achard, F., Pekel, J.-F., Vieilledent, G., Carboni, S., Simonetti, D., Gallego, J., Aragão, L. E. O. C., & Nasi, R. (2021). Long-term (1990–2019) monitoring of forest cover changes in the humid tropics. Science Advances, 7(10). https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abe1603

name: GFC_TC_2020
description: Areas of tree cover over 10 percent in 2020 (loss pixels removed).
source: Hansen, M. C., Potapov, P. V., Moore, R., Hancher, M., Turubanova, S. A., Tyukavina, A., Thau, D., Stehman, S. V., Goetz, S. J., Loveland, T. R., Kommareddy, A., Egorov, A., Chini, L., Justice, C. O., & Townshend, J. R. G. (2013). High-Resolution Global Maps of 21st-Century Forest Cover Change. Science, 342(6160), 850–853. https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1244693. Data available online from: https://glad.earthengine.app/view/global-forest-change.

name: JAXA_FNF_2020
description: Dense and non-dense forest classes (i.e., 1 & 2) for 2020.
source: Shimada, M., Itoh, T., Motooka, T., Watanabe, M., Shiraishi, T., Thapa, R., & Lucas, R. (2014). New global forest/non-forest maps from ALOS PALSAR data (2007–2010). Remote Sensing of Environment, 155, 13–31. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2014.04.014

name: GLAD_LULC_2020
description: Classes from the 2020 land cover map representing stable tree cover over 5m in height (i.e. 27 to 48, and 127 to 148).
source: Potapov, P., Hansen, M. C., Pickens, A., Hernandez-Serna, A., Tyukavina, A., Turubanova, S., Zalles, V., Li, X., Khan, A., Stolle, F., Harris, N., Song, X.-P., Baggett, A., Kommareddy, I., & Kommareddy, A. (2022). The Global 2000-2020 Land Cover and Land Use Change Dataset Derived From the Landsat Archive: First Results. Frontiers in Remote Sensing, 3, 856903. https://doi.org/10.3389/frsen.2022.856903

name: ESA_TC_2020
description: Tree and mangrove classes (i.e., 10 and 95) for 2020.
source: Zanaga, D., Van De Kerchove, R., De Keersmaecker, W., Souverijns, N., Brockmann, C., Quast, R., Wevers, J., Grosu, A., Paccini, A., Vergnaud, S., Cartus, O., Santoro, M., Fritz, S., Georgieva, I., Lesiv, M., Carter, S., Herold, M., Li, L., Tsendbazar, N.-E., Ramoino, F., Arino, O. (2021). ESA WorldCover 10 m 2020 v100 (v100) [Dataset]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/ZENODO.5571936

name: ESRI_TC_2020
description: Tree class (i.e., class 2) for 2020.
source: Karra, K., Kontgis, C., Statman-Weil, Z., Mazzariello, J. C., Mathis, M., & Brumby, S. P. (2021). Global land use / land cover with Sentinel 2 and deep learning. 2021 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium IGARSS, 4704–4707. https://doi.org/10.1109/IGARSS47720.2021.9553499

name: TMF_plant
description: Classes representing any type of plantation (i.e., 81 to 86).
source: Vancutsem, C., Achard, F., Pekel, J.-F., Vieilledent, G., Carboni, S., Simonetti, D., Gallego, J., Aragão, L. E. O. C., & Nasi, R. (2021). Long-term (1990–2019) monitoring of forest cover changes in the humid tropics. Science Advances, 7(10). https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abe1603

name: Oil_palm_Descals
description: Classes from the “classification band” representing oil palm plantations (i.e., 0 & 1).
source: Descals, A., Wich, S., Meijaard, E., Gaveau, D. L. A., Peedell, S., & Szantoi, Z. (2021). High-resolution global map of smallholder and industrial closed-canopy oil palm plantations. Earth System Science Data, 13(3), 1211–1231. https://doi.org/10.5194/essd-13-1211-2021

name: Oil_palm_FDaP
description: Binary layer. For certain countries only.
source: FDaP (2024). Lookup GEE datasets. In: Forest Data Partnership – GitHub. https://github.com/forestdatapartnership/whisp/blob/main/parameters/lookup_gee_datasets.csv

name: Cocoa_ETH
description: Binary product where 1 represents cocoa. Product derived from a cocoa probability map where the recommended threshold of >65%, had already been applied.
source: Kalischek, N., Lang, N., Renier, C., Daudt, R. C., Addoah, T., Thompson, W., Blaser-Hart, W. J., Garrett, R., Schindler, K., & Wegner, J. D. (2022). Satellite-based high-resolution maps of cocoa planted area for Côte d’Ivoire and Ghana (5). arXiv. https://doi.org/10.48550/ARXIV.2206.06119

name: Cocoa_bnetd
description: Commodity class for cocoa (i.e., class 9). For Côte d'Ivoire only.
source: BNETD (2024). Occupation des sols de la Côte d'Ivoire en 2020 (Version 2). Centre d'Information Géographique et du Numérique / Bureau National d’Études Techniques et de Developpement. Côte d'Ivoire, 2024. Data available online from: https://arcg.is/0uHOi90

name: TMF_deg_before_2020
description: Binary masks of aggregate degradation & deforestation between 2000 and 2020.
source: Vancutsem, C., Achard, F., Pekel, J.-F., Vieilledent, G., Carboni, S., Simonetti, D., Gallego, J., Aragão, L. E. O. C., & Nasi, R. (2021). Long-term (1990–2019) monitoring of forest cover changes in the humid tropics. Science Advances, 7(10). https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abe1603

name: GFC_loss_before_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate tree cover losses between 2000 and 2020.
source: Hansen, M. C., Potapov, P. V., Moore, R., Hancher, M., Turubanova, S. A., Tyukavina, A., Thau, D., Stehman, S. V., Goetz, S. J., Loveland, T. R., Kommareddy, A., Egorov, A., Chini, L., Justice, C. O., & Townshend, J. R. G. (2013). High-Resolution Global Maps of 21st-Century Forest Cover Change. Science, 342(6160), 850–853. https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1244693. Data available online from: https://glad.earthengine.app/view/global-forest-change.

name: RADD_before_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate confirmed (i.e., class 3) alerts in 2019 & 2020.
source: Reiche, J., Mullissa, A., Slagter, B., Gou, Y., Tsendbazar, N.-E., Odongo-Braun, C., Vollrath, A., Weisse, M. J., Stolle, F., Pickens, A., Donchyts, G., Clinton, N., Gorelick, N., & Herold, M. (2021). Forest disturbance alerts for the Congo Basin using Sentinel-1. Environmental Research Letters, 16(2), 024005. https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/abd0a8

name: MODIS_fire_before_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate burnt areas between 2000 and 2020.
source: Giglio, L., Justice, C., Boschetti, L., & Roy, D. (2021). MODIS/Terra+Aqua Burned Area Monthly L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V061 [Dataset]. NASA EOSDIS Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center. https://doi.org/10.5067/MODIS/MCD64A1.061

name: ESA_fire_before_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate burnt areas between 2001 and 2020.
source: Lizundia-Loiola, J., Otón, G., Ramo, R., & Chuvieco, E. (2020). A spatio-temporal active-fire clustering approach for global burned area mapping at 250 m from MODIS data. Remote Sensing of Environment, 236, 111493. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.rse.2019.111493

name: TMF_deg_after_2020
description: Binary masks of aggregate degradation & deforestation from 2021 onward.
source: Vancutsem, C., Achard, F., Pekel, J.-F., Vieilledent, G., Carboni, S., Simonetti, D., Gallego, J., Aragão, L. E. O. C., & Nasi, R. (2021). Long-term (1990–2019) monitoring of forest cover changes in the humid tropics. Science Advances, 7(10). https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abe1603

name: GFC_loss_after_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate tree cover losses from 2021 onward.
source: Hansen, M. C., Potapov, P. V., Moore, R., Hancher, M., Turubanova, S. A., Tyukavina, A., Thau, D., Stehman, S. V., Goetz, S. J., Loveland, T. R., Kommareddy, A., Egorov, A., Chini, L., Justice, C. O., & Townshend, J. R. G. (2013). High-Resolution Global Maps of 21st-Century Forest Cover Change. Science, 342(6160), 850–853. https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1244693. Data available online from: https://glad.earthengine.app/view/global-forest-change.

name: RADD_after_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate confirmed (i.e., class 3) alerts from 2021 onward.
source: Reiche, J., Mullissa, A., Slagter, B., Gou, Y., Tsendbazar, N.-E., Odongo-Braun, C., Vollrath, A., Weisse, M. J., Stolle, F., Pickens, A., Donchyts, G., Clinton, N., Gorelick, N., & Herold, M. (2021). Forest disturbance alerts for the Congo Basin using Sentinel-1. Environmental Research Letters, 16(2), 024005. https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/abd0a8

name: MODIS_fire_after_2020
description: Binary mask of aggregate burnt areas from 2021 onward.
source: Giglio, L., Justice, C., Boschetti, L., & Roy, D. (2021). MODIS/Terra+Aqua Burned Area Monthly L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V061 [Dataset]. NASA EOSDIS Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center. https://doi.org/10.5067/MODIS/MCD64A1.061
